评论概述: Runs large but gives that edgy slouchy look.
评论详情: This waffle sweater is very comfortable, and when I first tried it on  it appeared way too big, so I ordered another style and down a size which arrived today. It had a perfect fit but I wanted slouchy so I put this larger one on; rolled the sleeves up and played with the neckline. Perfect Perfect Perfect. So I will be keeping this one and will return my second choice. Pros is this waffle sweater is very lightweight and comfortable. Dress it down or throw on some fancy jewelry and dress it up!

This shirt quickly made its way into my weekly rotation of regular outfits. It's comfortable, fits great, and it's not thin. I like how the back is a little longer than the front, and the cut is super flattering. Great value!

This is a nice sloppy top for cool weather, perfect for daily wear but it does run a bit large - hoping it shrinks a tad.  It has a thermal texture but is too thin to be thermal.  That said, It is a good top for working or just lazing.  I will get plenty of use out of it
The fabric is a bit thinner than I expected. The neck is really large. Length is fine / covers my hiney if I wear it with yoga pants.  I am 5'2" and 125 lbs. Ordered a  size small.

I am 5’4 and 140 lbs. I ordered the color Green504 in a Small and love how it fits! Sweater is comfy and a little oversized. Can be worn off the shoulder a bit as seen in pictures if wanted but also stays put if you prefer not to. The fabric is what I’d consider medium weight in thickness. Definitely won’t keep you warm if worn alone outside in colder temps but did keep me comfortable (but not hot) inside at work where the halls are freezing and the temperature fluctuates from hot to cold from room to room. (I work in a junior high school) I tend to run hot and never felt overheated while wearing and running around the building with my busy schedule accompanying students with special needs to their classes. It’s currently the beginning of November in Arkansas and about 60 degrees outside during the day. I wore the shirt without a coat or extra layer and was quite comfortable. Very happy with my purchase! I’ve only worn it once but seems as though it will hold up in regard to wear and tear. I hope this helps! :-)

The neck line is way too big and falls off shoulders a lot. I did see this in a review from someone else but I wish I would not have bought it. Also the color is not right and has fading in spots all over the shirt. overall I will not buy another one. Do not recommend by putting it in the dryer to make smaller it’s will shrink and be shorter and the fabric is also way too thin. Shirt is very poorly  made . Disappointed!

I ordered a medium (I’m usually a medium or a large depending on material etc) it’s a lightweight waffle type pullover. It is oversized and comfy. However, the neck is really wide but not wide enough for the off the shoulder look. The real problem is the color! I didn’t realize (since it’s not really shown in the stock photos) that it’s splotchy! It almost looks defective and there was an error being made or even that a bunch of bleach or something got on it in the wash. I looked at reviews and someone else had the same complaint. So just know that’s what you’re getting and it’s not a “washed” look and more of a bleached/defective look. I’ll return it bc I think I would get looks if I wore it out

I had waited for the price to go down and got a fairly good cost. These sweatshirts are awesome! I got the brown and navy. Size is true. Super comfy! They wash up really nice! No extra care at all. Really really pleased with this item! Definitely recommend even at regular cost!

评论概述: Cute shirt! True to size fit!
评论详情: Love the shirt. Great fit. Looks good on.  It's not as soft as I was hoping, tho, so I gave it 4 stars. Bought the large.
Very comfortable shirt runs large could have gone a size smaller.

I have ordered two of these sweatshirts (black and rose) and I absolutely love them. I think $29 is a lil expensive honestly. But, they wash and dry well and the fabric is good quality. Would definitely recommend.

I have to say Amazon clothes have gone to crap. This shirt is an awful still material. Not cozy at all. I kept it because I forgot to return it was sitting in my closet. I stopped buying clothes from them . I had a shirt I bought 2 years ago and reordered a new one it was the same stiff  material. Not the same as a few years ago. They need to do better!
I love the color, fabric is great and the style. The only issue is that the size runs very big on this.
It’s not soft but I like it. I will order another color.
Oversized and fits great!

It’s a good shirt. Thicker, waffle long sleeve. The neck is a little wide /boat neck. But I like it. The length is good. I wore it today to Bru ch with jeans. Perfect. Not as long as the listing shows but probably because I sized down. One side up was too big and made me look frumpy.

评论概述: Disappointed with material, returned. Size Up

Purchased in 2 colors thus far. Love it. All around great top.  Highly recommend
I like this shirt but it does run big.  You could order down a size.
Massive! Definitely size down 1 to 2 sizes. I'm typically a large for a loose fitting sweater so I got a large in this and was swimming in it. Material is also a bit stiff
Comfortable, love the look. Ordered a large as I like a roomy oversize fit even though sz chart recommended med (5'4", 132 lbs). Have this top in 3 colors, very nice top!
Didn't look good on me with long open  collar
I really like this sweatshirt

This is well-made and true to size. The color is the issue: As other reviewers have stated, there are white splotches as if it’s lightly tie dyed. It doesn’t look bad, that part just isn’t in the description of the product.
Super cute and comfy!
Nice blouse

Definitely size down. I bought a large and it fits fine and still oversized. I usually wear X-Large size 14. It’s waffle texture but not soft and not stretchy but it will work as a Fall top
Comfortable
This top is cute and I’m keeping it but you should know it’s not a sweatshirt! It’s styled like a sweatshirt but the actual item is thin like a t-shirt.

Super cute, and it's the perfect length and thickness. I am 5'1" and have all of my (non-existent) height in my legs so most shirts are fairly long on me. The fabric is nice, not too thin and not too thick, and it's not scratchy. The neckline doesn't sit super high or low, it's pretty much just right. I have wider shoulders and some shirts make the look even wider, this one doesn't. Perfect for fall/winter!
It's my favorite shirt. Lightweight but warm. Baggy but not big. I'll order more in different colors.
The fit was ok but cuffs on sleeves are too big

I love this top. It is super comfy and cute on. Very good quality!
This shirt can be very versatile… I feel like I can wear it casually with leggings and sneakers or off the shoulder with jeans and boots… It’s very comfortable. I love the color and loose fit!

评论概述: This company is my go to for tops

They wash beautifully and so far no pilling , I will edit if necessary. Not too heavy and it is enough to keep you warm
Love how this shirt fits on me! Love the oversize of it and the color. The material is a little different, nothing horrible but different than what I expected but still love the shirt!
Love the color. Fits great! The material is a little rough though.
Exactly what I was looking for building my capsule wardrobe. I sized up for looser fit and it looks how I expected. Material seems good.
Too big and too light.
Good fit good quality very comfy warm

I love the color fits loosely i wear a Medum and its just right. I have washed it, shrunk a tad but still comfortable and fits well. I give it 10 out of 10. I definitely want to get it in another color.

Nice and warm and comfy for the fall - size accurate and easy to pair with leggings or jeans
The shirt was to big. I will  be returning it.
Thinking about buying this in other colors. It is so comfortable.
The pictures don't do it justice.. this is so much cuter in person. I love it. Comfy and cute.  Nice quality not too thick and color is spot on. I want one in every color
Actually a very good quality, true to size
Cute and comfy!
I was expecting comfortable, but this shirt is itchy and not soft. Im returning it.

This top runs EXTREMELY large!  I typically wear a L or XL.  I wanted something a little slouchy.  The description does say over-sized.  But I ordered an XL and it fit like a 2X or maybe a 3X.  I would recommend sizing down two sizes.  That said-the fabric was soft and the color was nice.  But I’m returning mine.
The waffle knit was not as I expected. A very stif and uncomfortable material.

Might be a new work shirt. I don’t love the fit. The collar is wide, armpits wide, waist tapers in and the arms are too long. With holidays around the corner I don’t feel like returning, but I normally would. Ordered a large. I’m 5’2” and typically a large is a solid size for me.
Good quality, comfortable and I received several compliments when I wore it. Would buy again.
The fabric isn't as soft as expected, and the collar is so wide that bra straps show.

The burgundy color wasn’t the shade or solid like the picture. That wasn’t a total shock but the fabric was stiff and really rough. I didn’t want to take the chance on keeping it and it fading bad. There’s just enough that I didn’t like about it that I returned it. Came shortly after I ordered it and packaged well though.
The slits on the sides are cut long and I have to wear a tank under otherwise my hips show.
Nice  fit and  Looks sports ,warmth but not hot just to keep you confy. It's soft quality fabric and washable,  not thick at all.
Cute and cozy !

The color was like a muted red, in between a pink and a red.  It was not at all like I thought it would look.

Great color and fit, but I think the neck is strange. People, when you write reviews Please include your True weight and height. That’s how I decide on size. No one is going know you and if they do they can out you! Lol

This top is basically just an oversized cheap thermal. The photo image makes it looked like a faded sweatshirt to which it is not. It is honestly not worth the price. The coloring is off and it feels a bit scratchy. I will likely be returning.
It fits bigger than I thought it would.
Thin sweatshirt in waffle texture, soft fabric is so comfy.  Makes a nice layer for fall!  Much nicer than expected.  I’m so glad I bought it!
A very comfy, cozy fit, but very oversized. You could definitely size down and it would still fit oversized. Very pretty color, and lightweight.

Oversized so don’t size up. Washed and dried with no shrinkage. Good quality but not overly heavy. Fun with jeans or leggings. I am 5’5”, 185lbs, ordered an XL.. wondering if a large would have fit, but this one is long enough for leggings so I am happy with it.
I bought this for several members of my family. Everyone loved it, and it fit perfectly with each one, and all different sizes. Absolutely recommend this product.
Not as advertised. This is more like a sweater no sweatshirt. Looks nothing like the picture. But is still pretty and wears well. Don't regret buying it at all.
Love this light weight shirt. Perfect for transitioning into fall! Great quality!
The way it read I thought that s was a sweatshirt.It is not a sweatshirt.  Plus runs big . I’m sure I won’t be able to wear it  4 star because it’s not bad if it was what you wanted
The material was thin, color wasn’t exactly as appeared in photo it’s ok
This shirt seems to run big. It was cute and cozy, but not super dressy. For the price it’s worth it.
I love the look and how it fits however it is pretty thin material. If you’re looking for something to keep you warm, this is not it. I otherwise like the color and it is somewhat soft material.
Put over white T-shirt and black leggings

This looks like something I'd get from Aerie (my guilty pleasure store) and I love pairing it with leggings. It's true to size. I got a Medium. I'm 5'2 and 160 lbs and 28 weeks pregnant and it fits perfectly oversized. Highly recommend!
Disliked the material-waffle I am in the process of returning the top.

I bought one of these, liked it, but it was too big. So, I returned it, and bought the exact same one in a smaller size. Amazon is just no longer the place to go for clothing. This looked great out of the packaging. One wash and put it on and it is limp. The neckline is large and unflattering. It does not hang as low as the photo. I will keep it to work in but no, it is not worth the $27 I paid for it.
I love the color of the length and the style.
Not as cute as the picture shows it but it is very comfortable!
I like my shirts like this oversized, but this was sloppy. I’m ordering a size smaller UPDATE The medium is also sloppy big and I missed the window for return

评论概述: Runs big but soft and comfy

Perfect lounge around the house shirt or throw it on to run some quick errands!
Was a bit lighter weight than I expected. Runs a bit large but ok by me.
I LOVE this top. Its easy care, perfect with leggings and just as perfect with jeans and friend tucked a bit.  I did size up one so it’s a little extra relaxed.

It is definitely oversized, ordered my regular size and it looks a bit sloppy and large around neckline but still comfortable and can pull off a casual, lazy day look. Size down and you’ll still get the oversized look but a little less sloppy. Also much thinner material than I expected, kind of overpriced tbh.
It’s very thin and is not a sweatshirt. It’s thin waffle thermal material. You may also want to size down. It is very oversized. Color does not match online pic color.
Love the way it fits,true to size.

I’m a plus size girl who likes longer shirts. This you can buy in your sized and it still be oversized. The sleeves are a little long on me but I am on the shorter side.  It is very comfortable. I’ve only washed it once so can’t say much about how it holds up.

To be honest the quality is terrible for the price. Amazon is getting out of control on pricing. I could have gotten this off of Temu for a fraction of the cost and it would have been the same product. Do better!

Underneath the sleeves seem to pull like there isn’t enough material I have this problem with things made in China . The neck is to wide to big it isn’t comfortable it’s not sweat shirt material it’s waffle knit nothing like the picture don’t recommend .

This shirt is really cute. It’s oversized but not too much. I’m 100lbs and 5’4. It’s lightweight so if you are in really cold climates you would need a long sleeved shirt underneath it or a jacket. I got the teal and it’s so pretty! It’s also a great length for leggings!
